sense.name: location where things are connected, fastened
sense.examples: Sew a seam at the join of the sleeve to the bodice of the blouse. There was a train collision at the join of the north-south track the east-west track.

sense.name: a set containing all the members of two other sets
sense.examples: The join of the employee database table to the manager table will show who manages each employee. The text describes how to perform an outer join.
